title: Spittin' Chiclets Episode 333: Featuring Marcus Foligno
description:
On Episode 333 of Spittinâ€™ Chiclets, the guys are joined by Marcus Foligno of the Minnesota Wild. Marcus joined (55:54) to discuss playing in Minnesota, his time in Buffalo, Kirill Kaprizov and tons more. The guys open up the show giving their playoff predictions while breaking down each playoff series. The guys also talk about the Let Them Play tournament, hosted by Barstool Sports. And finally, the boys wrap up the show talking some golf, movies and where the NHL Final Four could be hosted.


You can find every episode of this show on Apple Podcasts, Spotify or YouTube. Prime Members can listen ad-free on Amazon Music. For more, visit barstool.link/schiclets
dc:creator: Barstool Sports
